nodes.text: The Society of Outcasts was a society of people exiled from the Kerritamba way of life. They made their living in the ShadowWeave caverns of the Kkowir Forest on Kashyyyk. Their typical attire was red and black in color, consisting of a red and black vest with black pants. Their leaders were known as Exemplar of the Society. They lived alongside the creatures they treated as pets, the webweavers that inhabited the cave. They were known to make potent spice and to wage war with the Kerritamba.
